They dive in to the mindset of comedians that go on tour, and Pat discusses how his approach differs from most comedians. The guys also break down the lost OJ Simpson interview and his "hypothetical" confession, how Taylor Swift may have lost her mind and is entering a similar stage in her career to Britney Spears when she shaved her head, who created Daylight Savings Time, and discuss which movies Pat and has seen, and which ones he just gets. Today's show is a great time. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 142 - Country Friday
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat is joined by Shaun and the entire Heartland Radio crew as they go to the internet to answer some of the best questions that were submitted this week. The Polar Vortex also stops by to talk about his recent return to the Midwest, his European vacation, and what he plans to do now that spring and summer are approaching. They also chat about the consequences of Nick taking a massive kick to the head from Todd with a football helmet on, and how he may now be a permanent resident of CTE City. This week, the crew looks to diversify Friday Bangerz as they select all country songs to help send you into the weekend. It's a good one. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 141 - Mouthpiece Of The NFL, Rich Eisen
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat is joined by Shaun, Digs, and Nick for a couple of incredible conversations. One of the NFL network's biggest stars, host of The Rich Eisen Show, and mouthpiece of the NFL, Rich Eisen joins the guys to talk about the response he's getting from the letter he penned to the NFL as Ed Hochuli, gives a couple of updates from around the league, and addresses being called the mouthpiece of the NFL, and whether or not that's a bad thing (15:44). Later, one of the best radio producers in the world, former producer of the Jay Thomas Show, and producer of The Pat McAfee Show on Sirius XM Power 85, The Mighty Beast, Gonzo, joins the guys for an incredible conversation about his career in radio, how he reacted to learning about Barstool's new Sirius channel, and what he does for fun in New York City (26:09). After the show, wrestling legend Rip Rogers joins Pat and Nick in studio for this week's wrestling recap. They chat about Pat's wrestling debut at NXT in Indianapolis and what Rip thought of the night. They also cover everything that happened this week in the WWE, and Rip shares some hilarious stories (1:25:47). Today's show is a great one. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 140 - Brain Talk
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat, Shaun, Digs, Nick, and Zito chat about Pat's debut at the WWE NXT show in Indianapolis, AQ Shipley gives a surprise call to discuss his offseason thus far, Pat discusses the time he was involved in a high speed chase, and the guys discuss one of the worst park jobs on the face of the earth that happened right in front of the office. Later, former NFL WR, and teammate of Pat's, Austin Collie calls into the show to discuss going on a Mormon mission while playing college football at BYU, some of his experiences as Pat's teammate, and what he's been doing lately to help educate people about concussions at all levels of football (51:06) Also, Pro Football Talk's Mike Florio joins the guys in studio to discuss his start in the business, some of the things he learned at the combine, and how being a lawyer helped him create one of the most successful football blogs on the planet (01:17:47). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 139 - Olympic Gold Medalist Matty Hamilton
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat, Shaun, and the entire Heartland Radio crew get together to recap a very busy week. They discuss Laron Landry and his pet monkey Gucci, the history of the Ides of March, and their favorite news stories of the week including a very expensive Jim Kong update and the building feud between Pat and NXT wrestler Adam Cole ahead of Pat's debut as the ring announcer at this weekend's NXT event in Indianapolis. Later, the Big Unit of Curling, Olympic gold medalist, owner of one of the most glorious mustaches on the face of the earth, and one of Pat's best friends, Matty Hamilton, calls into the show for an incredible conversation. He and Pat chat about some different curling strategies that were used in South Korea, what the point of some of the equipment is, how he plans to celebrate his gold medal, and what's next for the future of US Curling (27:16). As always, the guys give you more Friday Bangerz to send you into the weekend in a fantastic fashion.  Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 138 - Pardon My Take
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat, Shaun, Digs, and Nick are joined by Big Cat and PFT Commenter of the number one sports podcast Pardon My Take to shoot the breeze. They discuss what PFT was doing before Barstool, and how he and Big Cat first met, Big Cat's passion for singing the National Anthem, what they've been doing this week at the NFL Combine in Indy, their thoughts on whether or not Jon Gruden will be successful with the Raiders, and much more (3:35-1:20:50). After the show, Pat, Nick, and Rip Rogers are joined by independent wrestling legend and WWE hopeful Dylan Bostic to chat about his long career in wrestling despite still being young, his recent tryout with the WWE, and what it was like being trained by Rip (1:27:38). Later, Barstool's own Robbie Fox joins Nick and Rip to cover everything you might have missed in the WWE this week (1:37:16). Today's show is a can't miss. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 137 - Mike Florio: Mafia Talk
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat is joined by Nick and Barstool Heartland's Director of Morale, Zito, as Shaun and Digs are each serving a one podcast suspension. The guys chat about Pat's experience at the movie theatre this weekend, where Pat is considering sending his future child for college, how elite PFT Commenter's brain is, and the guys help Zito brush up on his Yinzer accent. Later, Pro Football Talk's Mike Florio joins the show to talk about Roger Goodell fining Jerry Jones millions of dollars, what he's looking forward to the most from the NFL scouting combine, and what he thinks about some of the current Quarterback contracts in the NFL (59:04). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 136 - 4th Place In The Amazing Race
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined by the Heartland Radio crew and Indy Car driver and now reality TV star, Conor Daly, to discuss his experience on the Amazing Race, and what his plans are for the future with Indy Car, whether he wants to pursue more reality TV opportunities, and he and Tactical Digs see who will win in a common sense challenge. As always, the guys end the show by giving you some Friday Bangerz to send you into the weekend. Today's show is a great time. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 135 - Canceling A Surprise Shark Tank Pitch
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat, Shaun, Digs, and Nick discuss Pat going on Shark Tank to pitch a couple of different business plans to Mark Cuban. They also cover some of the news stories making waves around the world, including a Winter Olympics recap, football players putting M.D. on the back of their jersey's and the differences between different types of doctors, and Lucky Charms changing up their marshmallow selection. After the show, stick around for the weekly wrestling recap where wrestling legend Rip Rogers, and Barstool's MMA/WWE blogger Robbie Fox join the show to cover everything you may have missed in the WWE this week (1:34:14). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 134 - Rough N' Rowdy Recap
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat, Shaun, Digs, and Nick recap their wild weekend in West Virginia. They cover all the drama surrounding the decision in Shaun's fight, Smitty on steroids, and whether or not Shaun would be up for a rematch. They are also joined by Dave Portnoy who recaps Rough N' Rowdy with the guys, and discusses firing Michael Rapaport from his bed on Sunday morning (34:18). Later, the guys are joined by top Bellator Heavyweight and friend of the show, Matt Mitrione, who discusses his fight on Friday night against Roy Nelson, and why he lost respect for him after their fight. He also discusses who he thinks he'll be facing next in the Bellator Heavyweight Tournament, and what he said in his phone conversation with Shaun following each of their fights on Friday night (01:12:40). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 133 - Rough N' Rowdy
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat, Shaun, Digs, Nick, and Todd are live from a hotel lobby in Morgantown, West Virginia in preparation for The Big Homie's fight tonight against Smitty at Rough 'N Rowdy 2. They chat with several Barstool personalities including El Pres, Dave Portnoy, Caleb Pressley, Rone, Lightswitch Lou, and Smitty himself sits down with the guy. They cover what to expect from Rough N' Rowdy 2, their thoughts on the weigh-in's and how it swayed the betting odds, and also spotlight some other fighters that will be on the PPV undercard. The guys also give Shaun a couple of bangerz to consider listening to before his fight. It's a great time. Come laugh with us.

episodes.title: PMS 132 - I'm A Big J Journalist Now
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat, Shaun, Digs, and Nick chat about Pat's breakthrough moment as a legitimate big J journalist during Frank Reich's introductory press conference for the Colts (8:40). They discuss the latest news from the winter Olympics, and also breakdown what Valentine's Day actually means, and Pat brings his Valentine's Day gift into the studio. They also discuss how Pat will be retiring from chugging beers, as he reflects on what an incredible run it has been (37:31). After the episode, Rip Rogers and Barstool's WWE/MMA blogger Robbie Fox join the show to recap everything that has been going on in the WWE and give a little preview of what to expect at Rough N' Rowdy 2 (57:26). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 131 - Bert Kreischer - The Machine
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat, Shaun, Digs, and Nick recap what they've seen so far in the Winter Olympics, discuss where they stand on Johnny Football's comeback, spotlight how Shaun is feeling leading up to Rough N Rowdy 2, and Pat chats about how he's quickly becoming a big baseball guy. Later, comedian and party animal, The Machine Bert Kreischer, joins the show for a hilarious conversation. They chat about how he was the inspiration for the movie Van Wilder after being featured in Rolling Stone while in college, how Will Smith discovered him, Bert tells one of the greatest stories about Tracy Morgan of all-time, and whether or not he drinks on stage during his sets (39:15). Today's show is a great time. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 130 - A Deep Conversation With Gabriel Iglesias
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined by the Heartland Radio crew as they react to Jason Kelce's speech from the Eagles parade yesterday, and share their favorite news stories from this week including Gronk's house being broken into, and Quincy Jones commenting on Richard Pryor and Marlon Brando's relationship. Later, one of the most successful comedians in the world, the man known as Fluffy, Gabriel Iglesias, calls into the show for an absolutely incredible conversation that you don't want to miss. They chat about what Fluffy has been up to after taking a little time off, what his favorite city to perform in is, his most memorable onstage story, and what some of his goals for the future are (51:15). As always, they close out the show with Friday Bangerz to send you into the weekend. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 129 - My National Signing Day Situation
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat, Shaun, Digs, and Nick discuss National Signing Day, as Pat tells the story about his signing day which is one for the ages. They also cover some topical news stories around the globe. Later, starting TE of the newly crowned Super Bowl Champion Philadelphia Eagles, Zach Ertz, joins the show to talk about his catch that sealed the Super Bowl win, what he expects the parade to be like, and what it's like to be married to another incredible athlete (49:43). After the show, stick around for the weekly wrestling recap with Pat, Nick, Rip Rogers, and Barstool's resident wrestling/MMA blogger, Robbie Fox, cover everything going on in the WWE (01:26:17). To end the show, former WWE superstar James Ellsworth joins to the show to discuss what it was like getting into the WWE, what his plans for the future are, and how wrestlers from Rip's generation paved the way for current superstars like himself (02:04:31). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 128 - Back In Beautiful Indianapolis, Indiana
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat, Shaun, Digs, and Nick break down everything about the Super Bowl, including what the Eagles will do now that they have a quarterback controversy on their hands, where the Patriots go from here and whether or not this is the end of a dynasty, Justin Timberlake's halftime performance and some of the backlash, and what some of the best commercials of the night were. They also look ahead to the Winter Olympics and chat about some of their favorite events, and recap the wild week in Minnesota for the Super Bowl. It's a good one. Come laugh with us. Cheers

episodes.title: PMS 127 - Broken Ass Chair
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat, Shaun, Digs, and Nick record from the AirBnB in Minneapolis to take a look back at the week that was including a slate full of incredible interviews. Former Pro Bowl Running Back, Justin Forsett, joins the show as he is urged to sing a couple of tunes by Spice Adams (4:55). Next, Spice Adams sticks around to chat about bringing fanny packs back, what he's been up to at the Super Bowl, and how he brings out Hall of Fame talent from people (9:35). MMA legend Matt Mitrione also joins the show to discuss his upcoming fight against Roy Nelson, and what he's seen from Shaun leading up to Rough 'N' Rowdy (16:44). And Finally, Pro Bowl Linebacker, and the man who may have started Deflategate, D'Qwell Jackson joins the show to talk about some of his memories from being teammates with Pat, and hashing out everything related to Deflategate with Dave Portnoy himself (23:20) The guys wrap up the show with some locks for the Super Bowl, and some Friday Bangerz. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 126 - We're Ice Fishing
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat, Shaun, Digs, and Nick are joined by Young Pageviews from an ice castle on Lake Minnetonka as they record while doing a little ice fishing. Pat, Digs, and Nick try to keep pace with everyone else as they all discuss some of the best ways to catch some fish. Also included are interviews with future Hall of Famer, Terrell Owens, to discuss his thoughts on making a return to the XFL, and who he thinks is going to win the Super Bowl (8:32). Later, former NFL Running Back and Dancing With The Stars winner, Rashad Jennings, joins the show to discuss his life after football, how he almost predicted the Super Bowl before the season, and where he sees himself in the next couple of years (46:41). Today's show is a great time. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 125 - Hotel Room Concert
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined by Tactical Digs, World News Nick, and country superstar, Clayton Anderson, as they battle the elements from a hotel room from Minneapolis. They recap everything they've done in Minnesota so far, and what is planned for the rest of the week, chat about the results from the Grammy's, who some of Clayton's favorite current country performers are, come up with an outstanding idea for the XFL, talk a little more about Shaun's upcoming fight against Smitty at Rough 'N' Rowdy 2, and get an exclusive concert that was perhaps heard by the entire hotel. This episode is a can't miss. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 124 - Friday Trip To Space
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined in studio by the entire Heartland Radio crew. They discuss the XFL making its comeback and whether Pat might be able to get a gig, 50 Cent cashing in on his BitCoin investment, and how Pat missed the boat on his BitCoin opportunity, and go over their favorite news stories from this past week. Also on today's show, MMA legend, actor, and entrepreneur, "The Huntington Beach Bad Boy" Tito Ortiz, joins the show to chat with Pat about his career in the UFC, what Donald Trump told him about business, his strategy when playing Blackjack, and Tito also gives Shaun a couple of tips for his upcoming fight at Rough 'N' Rowdy 2 (11:16). To end the show, we add a couple new tracks to the best playlist on the internet with some Friday Bangerz to send you into the weekend. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 123 - Rip Rogers: Legendary Wrestler/Human
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined in studio by Tactical Digs, World News Nick, and wrestling legend Rip Rogers as the guys go beyond the ring with Rip and learn more about the wrestling business, including all the different places he's wrestled, the car accident that required him to get dentures, and recap this week in wrestling including RAW's 25th anniversary show. Later, former WWE superstar, Al Snow, joins the show to talk about how he created his in-ring gimmick, what he's been up to since leaving the WWE, and how he's got a side gig as a magician for the blind (26:22). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 122 - A Great Tuesday Conversation
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined in studio by Tactical Digs and World News Nick to shoot the breeze. They chat about going to Minnesota for the Super Bowl, give a little preview of what to expect on this week's Sirius shows, discuss Pat's super secret trip to LA, chat about Pat's experiences while ice fishing, and talk a little bit more about Shaun's fight at Rough 'N' Rowdy. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 121 - Dude's Name Is Shavago
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined by the Heartland radio guys and comedian Zhivago Blea to chat about drive through funeral services, the marriage between a woman and the 300 year old ghost of a pirate, and the spike in Pornhub activity after the false "Hawaiian Missile Crisis." They also give out their locks for the AFC and NFC Conference Championships, and as always, keep adding to the best playlist available with some more Friday Bangerz. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 120 - Sirius Launch Celebration
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined by Tactical Digs and World News Nick as they recap the launch of the Sirius show on Barstool Power 85, talk about some of their favorite documentaries, check in on Pat's relationship with his best friend, Aaron Rodgers, and give you a little sample of what to expect on the radio show (33:24). After the show, Pat and Nick sit down for the ‘Post Show Wrestling Wrap Up With Rip Rogers' as they cover all the current events in the WWE (54:51). They are also joined by former WWE superstar, Santino, as they discuss how his character was created, what some of his favorite moments from his career were, and what Vince McMahon is really like (01:22:45). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 119 - What A Weekend, Bro
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined in studio by Tactical Digs and World News Nick  to chat about their long weekends and look ahead to the Sirius show, and have another short conversation with the Big Homie Polar Vortex. Later, Pardon My Take producer, Handsome Hank, and Shaun's opponent at Rough N' Rowdy 2, Smitty join the guys in studio to discuss everything pertaining to the fight. They also breakdown the incredible divisional playoff games and look ahead to the conference championship games (43:54). Today is a CAN'T MISS. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 118 - What A Week
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined by the Heartland Radio crew as they recap the week that was. They chat more about Shaun's Rough N' Rowdy fight, being in a staged police chase, the small zoo Pat is accumulating at his house, how to react to a cold craps table, and everyone shares their favorite news stories of the week. Plus some NFL locks for the divisional round of the playoffs, and as always, we send you into the weekend with another electric version of Friday Bangerz. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 117 - From The Amazing Race To Wrestling
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun keep the doors in the studio open and are joined by World News Nick and Tactical Digs to cover everything including Shaun's Rough n' Rowdy fight announcement (including a call to Barstool Radio), the NFL divisional playoffs, cropdusting airplanes, why Digs can't stand the Kardashian family, and are also joined in studio by Mr. Polar Vortex himself (14:55). Later, Indy Car driver and one of the current stars of ‘The Amazing Race,' Conor Daly, stops by the studio to chat about what it was like filming 'The Amazing Race,' and his plans to make a NASCAR run soon (01:15:25). After the show, Pat is joined by World News Nick and wrestling legend Rip Rogers for a bonus conversation about all things wrestling including current events in the WWE, and a behind the scenes look at what goes on beyond the ring. They are also joined by former WWE superstar, Eugene, to chat about some of the best wrestlers he's ever faced off against, what he's currently doing, and where his WWE character came from (1:47:38). It's a great one. Come laugh with us. Cheers

episodes.title: PMS 116 - Tuesday With A Nostradamus
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined by Tactical Digs as he gives his 40 second NFL recap of Wildcard weekend. They also chat about Jeff Triplette's last game, what it's been like for Shaun training with Chris Lytle, and what it would be like to see Oprah and The Rock running together in 2020. Later, Barstool Pick Em' intern and all around Nostradamus, Black Jack Fletcher, joins the show for a hilarious conversation about his betting philosophy, what he does on a daily basis, and what he was doing prior to being a full-time gambling fiend (43:36). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 115 - Yeah, I Welcomed Eli Manning Into His House I Think
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined by the entire Heartland Radio team to shoot the breeze and send you into the first weekend of 2018. They discuss this weekend's NFL playoff games, heckling audience members at comedy shows, some of the more wild situations Pat has gotten into, including knocking back some red wine with Eli, Archie, Peyton, and Cooper Manning, and going to a golf outing that ended up morphing into a Playboy Playmate golf outing, and hanging out with Ron White. Also included are Pat and Shaun's NFL locks, and an incredible Friday Bangerz playlist curated by World News Nick (11:37). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 114 - Big Homie Polar Vortex Continues To Wreck America
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined by Tactical Digs and World News Nick as they recap yesterday's press conference that was held by  the Polar Vortex and the new arrival of the Bomb Cyclone that is creating havoc along the east coast. They also cover some topical things going on in the news, including another Jim Kong update, what some of their favorite Olympic sports are, which off brand products you can't skimp on, and chat a little more about the Sirius show starting January 15. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 113 - Real Hungover New Years Day
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat welcomes Shaun, Digs, Nick, and Todd as they try to pick up the pieces from Pat's New Years Eve show. They recap what happened throughout the night and try to work through their miserable hangovers. Later, magician Carl Michael stops by the studio to do a couple more magic tricks for Pat and the boys, and gives his recollection of events from the New Years Eve show (28:00). It's a good one. Come laugh with us, cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 112 - 2017 Had A Good Run
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat joins the Heartland Radio guys in studio for a hilarious conversation about different craps techniques, predictions for the 20 Dollar Chef, The Big Homie, Shaun Latham's Rough N' Rowdy fight in February, chat about the upcoming radio show on Sirius, and do a round of mad libs (3:46). Also included are Pat's locks of the week, and World News Nick and Tactical Digs stick around with Pat and Shaun for an electric edition of Friday Bangerz to send you into the new year (01:04:46). Let us help you bring in 2018 the right way. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 111 - Human Cockfighting Conversation
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined by Tactical Digs as they discuss James Harrison signing with the Patriots, the havoc the polar vortex has been creating, and other topical things going on around the NFL including Digs' 40 second recap. Later, Matt Mitrione stops by the studio for an incredible conversation. They discuss his upcoming fight against Roy Nelson, what he does to mentally prepare for a fight, and the time he almost snapped Pat's leg in half with a leg kick (46:09). Also joining the show for an absolutely hilarious conversation is Darren McMullen, host of the new show, NFL Football Fanatic on USA. They chat about what it was like being an NFL fan growing up in Scotland, some of his favorite NFL cities, and what it was like meeting David Letterman (01:18:21). It's a good time. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 110 - Sally McAfee Is In The Building
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat worries about being killed due to the backlash from his Simpson's rant. Later, Pat and Shaun sit down with 4x Pro Bowler Antonio Cromartie for a hilarious conversation. They discuss his 14 kids, what it was like running Pat over, and Pat learning how to play dominoes for the first time (11:07). Also included are Pat's NFL locks of the weekend, and per usual, Friday Bangerz with the entire McAfee family to get your holiday weekend going. It's a good one. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 109 - Chris 'Lights Out' Lytle
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun discuss Tom Brady's health guru and his beef with Bill Belichick, Lane Kiffin living his best life getting a 10 year extension at FAU, Shaun fighting in the next Rough 'N' Rowdy event, and Lavar Ball going to war with the NCAA trying to start a new basketball league. Later, firefighter, family man, and one of the most entertaining UFC fighters of all-time, Chris ‘Lights Out' Lytle, stops by the studio for an incredible conversation. They chat about his experiences coming up in the UFC, how he feels before a fight, and what he's doing to prepare for his bare knuckle boxing match in London, January 13 (48:00). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 108 - Dude's A Time Traveler
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun attempt to get to the bottom of Matt Groening and The Simpsons predicting so many things correctly about the future, and break down how he's a time traveler in an incredible rant. Later, Tactical Digs joins the show and gives his 40 second NFL recap, and chats about Marvin Lewis leaving the Bengals, Pat's experience with Rich Rod leaving and coming back at West Virginia, how miserable he was after the Pats beat the Steelers, and everything else that happened in the NFL this week. Stick around for another contest for a chance to win some free merch. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 107 - A Very Lit Friday
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun sit down with Dan Orlovsky for another hilarious convo. They chat about him getting into breaking down film on Twitter, what is said in conversations between Quarterbacks during pregame, and his thoughts on what can be done to improve the Pro Bowl (11:02). Pat and Shaun also give out a few NFL locks, and are joined in studio by DJ Lemi Vice who lays down an incredible Friday Bangerz mix to help send you into the weekend (32:02). Stick around after the show for a potential contest. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 106 - Seth Rogen
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun welcome in Heartland Radio and Snipe Celly cohost, World News Nick, who breaks down Jim Kong being able to control the weather, and dishes on everything that has happened thus far in the NHL (24:30). Plus an interview with a guy who has starred in way too many classic films to list, one of the funniest humans on the planet, Seth Rogen, in an absolutely hilarious conversation. They discuss his creative process and where he draws some of his ideas from, what his preferred method of smoking is and if he's ever not high, and how he got his start in comedy (6:41) Later, one of the stars of the new Netflix series, 'She's Gotta Have it,' and an original cast member of a little play called Hamilton, Anthony Ramos, sits down with Pat and Shaun. They chat about his Hamilton audition process, what he did to get into shape for 8 three hour shows every week, and what it was like getting a voicemail from Spike Lee (48:12). This one is one for the ages. Come laugh with us, cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 105 - The Nature Boy, Ric Flair
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun sit down with Tactical Digs who gives his 40 second NFL recap, and discusses Big Ben's resurgence, Josh Gordon's twitter war with Damarious Randall, and the Rams hiring actors and actresses to come to their home games (18:57). Later, Pat and Shaun talk to the Rolex wearing, diamond ring wearing, kiss stealing, wheeling dealing, limousine riding, jet flying son of a gun, the man who's having a hard time holding those alligators down, The Nature Boy, Ric Flair. They chat about what it takes to survive in today's WWE, how he decided how many shots he'd buy when in a bar, the craziest purchase he's ever made, and how he's been calling fans for four days straight (53:33). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 104 - Thunderstruck Waterfall
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun remember Pearl Harbor, discuss who they think will win the Heisman trophy, and wonder if the Browns will ever be good again. Pat also delivers his NFL locks of the week, and as always, we give you some bangerz to throw on your playlist to help set the mood this weekend. Let us help you start your weekend the right way. Come laugh with us, cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 103 - AJ Hawk: Dad Of The Year
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun discuss the aftermath of the bloodbath that was Steelers vs. Bengals, how gritty people moving to California during the gold rush were, how electric The Rock's promo's would be if he ran for president, Dog the Bounty Hunter's exploits in Hawaii, and some of their favorite Christmas movies. Later, AJ Hawk joins Pat and Shaun for one of the most hilarious conversations you'll hear. They chat about some of the lies he tells his kids to scare them into doing the right thing, what he thinks about Ohio State narrowly missing out on the College Football Playoff, and the gift he sent Pat for Christmas (45:57). After the show, Spice Adams stops by for a bonus conversation live from a hotel lobby in New York to chat about his new TV show, The Great American Baking Show, talk about his new peacoat, and request a song or two (1:25:23). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 102 - The Punter Who Got Decleated
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun discuss Time Magazine's candidates for ‘Person of the Year,' and whether or not Tiger is actually back. Jaguars punter, Brad Nortman, also joins the show to talk about his fake punt pass on Sunday, what it felt like getting decleated into next week on a PAT attempt, and how he spends his victory Monday's (40:51). Later, Tactical Digs stops by the studio to give his 40 second recap of everything that happened in the NFL, talk about twerking robots, and discuss how excited he is for college bowl season (01:03:24). It's a good one. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 101 - A Future HOFer And Some Bangers
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat is joined by Hall of Fame finalist, Isaac Bruce, for an incredible interview. They discuss what it was like playing for the Greatest Show on Turf, how many yards he thinks he would have in today's NFL, and what his potential Hall of Fame party will be like (14:43). Also included are Pat's NFL locks of the week, and Spice Adams joining Pat and Shaun in studio for one of the most electric renditions of weekend bangers that you will ever hear (44:00). Come laugh with us and let us help you start your weekend the right way. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 100 - We Made It To One Hundo
episodes.description: Today's show is a special one. The guys from Pardon My Take and Heartland Radio join Pat to help celebrate hitting the century mark. They have a hilarious conversation about Pat and Shaun's 11 hour bus ride from New York to Indianapolis with the PMT crew, Big Cat and Pat's first interactions with one another, PFT Commenter's incredible song writing chops, what the proper technique for wiping after taking a dump is, and a preview of some of the stuff Barstool Heartland and Pardon My Take will be doing this week. It's a great time. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 099 - Live From New York
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are live from Barstool HQ in New York. They chat about the aftermath of last night's Cyber Monday telethon, discuss what is going on in the NFL, dive in to the psyche of internet porn commenters, and are joined by a special guest to decide what Shaun will be cooking on this week's 20 Dollar Chef. Later, Pat is joined by Steelers kicker, Chris Boswell, coming off a game winning field goal on Sunday night. They have a great conversation about his pre-kick ritual, what his night life is like during the season, and how Mike Tomlin loves talking sh*t to him (30:07). It's a great time. Come laugh with us, cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 098 - Thanksgiving Celebration
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat and Shaun are joined by Spice Adams back in his minivan to help celebrate Thanksgiving. They chat about how Spice is handling his kids being off school, what his Thanksgiving menu is looking like and how to properly cook a turkey, and a possible upcoming collaboration with the 20 Dollar Chef (16:41). Later, the Heartland Radio crew stops by to talk about their Thanksgiving plans, and what they're thankful for (39:51). To close out the show, Pat selects a couple of bangerz to throw on your Thanksgiving playlist, and reflects on what he's thankful for. Come laugh with us. Cheers, and Happy Thanksgiving.

episodes.title: PMS 097 - Selfies With Stevie Wonder
episodes.description: On today's show, the 20 Dollar Chef, Shaun Latham, and Tactical Digs join Pat in studio to chat about some topical news stories. Shaun also gives a sneak peek of this week's 20 Dollar Chef meal, and Digs returns for another electric 40 second breakdown of everything that happened in the NFL. Pat is also joined by comedian Nick Thune, who chats about his recent movie premiere with Usher, taking pictures with Stevie Wonder, and what he does on a daily basis (46:15). Later, Dan Orlovsky stops by for a hilarious conversation including some of Dan's most miserable Thanksgiving memories playing football, some hysterical Matt Prater antics, and the least athletic teammate he's ever had (1:20:14). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 096 - I See Dead People
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat is joined in studio by Vibbs and Tactical Digs to help recap the week. Topics include Pat's time between the pipes playing goalie against the Indianapolis Fuel, the time Pat was profiled for driving a black Escalade with 24's, and what national holidays you may have missed this week. As always, Pat gives his locks of the week, and the guys give you their selections for your weekend bangerz playlist. To close out the show, Pat sits down for an interview with Hollywood star Haley Joel Osment, whose credits include The 6th Sense, The Entourage Movie, and Silicon Valley. They chat about what it's been like being in the movie industry for 25 years, how he's navigating the current issues in Hollywood, how he's handling being a Giants fan this season, and his new film, ‘Almost Friends' (1:12:22). Come laugh with us and let us help send you into the weekend. It's a fantastic time. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 095 - My Father, Tim
episodes.description: On today's show, Pat is joined by the 20 Dollar Chef, Shaun Latham, who gives everyone a quick geography lesson, and asks the age old question, ‘Can we live?' World News Nick also stops in the studio to give a long awaited Kim Jong Update, and tell us exactly what is going on in North Korea. Later, Pat is joined by his father, Tim, for one of the most incredible conversations you'll ever hear. They discuss Pat's phone call to Tim when Pat was involved in an alleged swimming incident, the time they went hunting together and Pat had to drag a deer 5 miles through mountainous terrain, and the night Tim spent slamming beers with Archie Manning (46:57). Also joining the show is NASCAR superstar Kurt Busch, who educates Pat on the sport of polo, and talks about how confident he is in his Mario Kart abilities (1:29:35). After the show, Jon and Brian of the new Mythbusters stop by to chat with Pat about some of their favorite experiments, what they do in their free time, and what we can expect from this season of Mythbusters in a bonus interview (1:40:10). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 094 - Colts General Manager Chris Ballard
episodes.description:
On today's show, Indianapolis Colts General Manager Chris Ballard sits down with Pat for a conversation about what it's like being a GM in the NFL, how he's dealing with the current situation the Colts are facing, and what it was like hearing Pat retired on his first day on the job (18:26).  Pat is also joined by the 20 Dollar Chef, Shaun Latham, to chat about his 39th birthday and what's on the menu for this week's episode of 20 Dollar Chef. Later, Tactical Digs joins Pat and Shaun to give his 45 second recap of the NFL, and reminisces about how much better Facebook was when it first started. After the show, Pat sits down with actress, gamer, Youtube Red star and co-creator of the scripted comedy series 'Good Game,' Michele Morrow, to discuss the culture of gaming, the underworld black market of video games, and Robert Kraft and A-Rod's Esports teams in a bonus interview. It's a good one. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 093 - We Have A Good Time Here
episodes.description: On today's show, the guys from Heartland Radio join Pat to slam a couple of brews, react to the backlash from Digs hating biscuits and gravy,   and talk about Todd's personality changes while in boot camp. The guys also talk about their favorite moments of this week, and as always, give you a couple of bangerz to put on your weekend playlist. Pat also delivers his NFL locks of the week and sends you into the weekend with an incredible conversation with star of the Marvel series ‘Inhumans,' Anson Mount. They chat about his vaping prowess, his discussion with former Hawaii football coach June Jones about changing the culture there, creating an alien sign language, and what it's like being close personal friends with Xzibit (1:25:21). Start your weekend the right way, come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 092 - Send Nudes To Mark Zuckerberg
episodes.description:
On today's show, Pat rants about some current events making waves in the news. He welcomes in Rams punter and For The Brand inaugural winner, Johnny Hekker to chat about the resurgence of the Rams in LA, Jared Goff's pregame playlists, and how he handles distractions in LA (16:09). Pat also sits down with 2015 Sprint Cup Series Champion and NASCAR superstar, Kyle Busch, for a convo involving a story about getting Steak N Shake together at 4 AM, Kyle's driving style, and his infamous fight with Joey Logano (50:00). Later, Pat sits down for an electric interview with The Source, Stu Feiner to chat about his career, betting philosophy, and what he does with his free time (1:11:54). After the show, the 20 Dollar Chef, Shaun Latham, stops in to tell a couple of hilarious stories about his time working as a corrections officer in Yuma, Arizona. It's a good one. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 091 - Marquette King, The Cougar Hunter
episodes.description: Pat recaps some of the major events that happened over the weekend. Pat also welcomes current punter of the Oakland Raiders, Marquette King for a hilarious conversation including his taste in women, and what he does to stay busy during games (1:01:21). Later, Pat sits down for a chat with one of the stars of 'Gotham,' and Indiana native, Drew Powell, to talk about what it's like currently being a Colts fan and what it was like to work with Bryan Cranston on 'Malcom in the Middle' (1:17:19). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 090 - A Magical Friday
episodes.description: Pat welcomes in the crew from Heartland Radio as the guys throw back a couple of beers and shoot the shit. AJ Hawk calls in from Seattle to join the guys as they chat about his play-by-play work, Halloween at the Hawk residence, and Pat performs AJ an exclusive magic trick (18:56). Pat also welcomes Corey Bellemore, the world record holder in the beer mile, as they talk about his training regimen, what it takes to run a fast beer mile, and conduct a little chug off. The guys finish off the pod by selecting their playlist bangers to send you into the weekend. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 089 - Dwight Freeney Is Not Good At Cornhole
episodes.description: On today's episode, Pat talks about the Conor McGregor interview getting pushed back, the Astros winning the world series, and discusses some current events in the news. Pat also welcomes former NFL quarterback and University of Kentucky legend, Jared Lorenzen. They chat about his time in college, the Indoor Football League, what his favorite nickname is, and The Lorenzen Project (37:17). Pat also welcomes former teammate, future Hall of Famer and current Seattle Seahawk, Dwight Freeney. They chat about his Sports Science comparison, his relationship with Michael Jordan, and games of cornhole in the locker room (01:06:03). #ComeLaughWithUs. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 088 - Juiced Balls
episodes.description: Pat welcomes Cincinnati Reds catcher, Tucker Barnhart, into the studio to chat about his journey to the MLB, and how juiced balls are impacting the World Series (25:49). Creator of the TBS show 'Drop the Mic,' Jensen Karp, joins the show to talk about his journey through the music industry, his relationship with Kanye West, and some of the big names he has worked with in his career (55:33). After the show, the 20 Dollar Chef, Shaun Latham stops in to talk about the grind of a stand up comedian, and gives a tease of this week's 20 Dollar Chef recipe in a bonus interview (01:32:14). Happy Halloween. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 087 - Oprah Winfrey is a Bartender
episodes.description: Tactical Digs sits down with Pat to talk about the slate of games this week in the NFL, while Pat delivers his locks of the week. Actor Omar J. Dorsey, one of the stars of the new film 'Thank You for Your Service' joins the show for an incredible conversation with Pat, as they chat about his friendship with Oprah and what it was like being a Falcons fan at the Super Bowl. (47:34) Pat ends the show with his playlist bangers to get your weekend jump started. Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 086 - The State of the Union: Barstool Sports
episodes.description: Pat is joined by the founder of Barstool Sports, Dave Portnoy, to discuss all the controversy, chaos, and war the pirate ship has been through the last week, and how he thrives while "living in the mud." Country superstar Wheeler Walker Jr. joins Pat to talk about the current state of country music, play a couple of cuts off his new album, and debut a new song (28:26). Vernon Davis also stops by for a quick chat, and tells Pat about one of the more wild pregame rituals out there (1:12:53). Come laugh with us. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 085 - Live From Barstool Sports HQ
episodes.description: Pat heads to New York to check in at the Headquarters of Barstool Sports. He is joined by Vibbs and the 20 Dollar Chef, Shaun Latham, and also sits down for a chat with the advertising director at Barstool Sports, Louis Roberts. Pat also welcomes Oakland Raiders cornerback, TJ Carrie for an incredible conversation (35:10). Come laugh with us.

episodes.title: PMS 084 - 12 Hour Psychedelic Trip
episodes.description: Pat sits down for a chat with former NFL vet and current screenwriter/executive producer, Kerry Rhodes, for a conversation about his new film, and a wild experience he had with psychedlics in Costa Rica (4:25). Pat also welcomes former teammate Chris Gronkowski to discuss his recent appearance on Shark Tank, and what it's like being in business with A-Rod and Mark Cuban (27:11). Current Jacksonville Jaguars defensive end Calais Campbell joins the show to discuss the Jaguars hot start (48:20), and newest Barstool Heartland employee Buck Coltrain takes you into the weekend with a new tune (1:10:54). Come laugh with us.

episodes.title: PMS 083 - 12 Year NFL Vet Punked By Peyton Manning
episodes.description: Pat sits down with former teammate and 12 year NFL veteran, Dan Orlovsky, to discuss what it was like playing on an 0-16 team, and being Peyton Manning's backup (19:11). A fan of the show joins Pat to chat about his encounter with Big Foot (56:33), and Pat also welcomes Barstool Nate to discuss his recent destruction of a critic trying to sink the pirate ship (1:24:32).

episodes.title: PMS 082 - Shane Lechler, Spice Adams, and AQ Shipley Stop By For A Good Time
episodes.description: Pat sits for a couple of incredible conversations with seven time Pro Bowler and current Houston Texans punter, Shane Lechler (23:34); former 49ers and Bears defensive tackle, Spice Adams (52:23); and recurring guest and current center of the Arizona Cardinals, AQ Shipley (1:18:27). Sit back and enjoy.

episodes.title: PMS 081 - John Daly Yourself Into The Weekend
episodes.description: Pat sits down with his good friend, John Daly. They discuss golf, music, football, and life in general. John Daly has been there and done that with literally everything. From gambling millions and millions of dollars away to winning a major championship. He's one of the most interesting humans to ever live. Laugh your way into the weekend.

episodes.title: PMS 080 - The GOAT; Adam Vinatieri
episodes.description: 4x Super Bowl Champ, 3X first-team All-Pro, and the most clutch athlete in the history of sports, Adam Vinatieri, sits down with Pat for a one-on-one conversation. They take a stroll down memory lane, discuss the Tuck Rule game, and chat about the current state of the NFL.

episodes.title: PMS 079 - Charcandrick West
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down with running back Charcandrick West from the undefeated Kansas City Chiefs to discuss his music career, philanthropy, and him sharting his pants at practice. The guys discuss Manning's big weekend, the Vice President, Governors, cocaine, Apple, sex island and more.

episodes.title: PMS 078 - Lock It Up
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down and discuss their favorite Barstool Heartland moments while Vibbs relaxes after a hard week. Tactical Digs brings you the latest sports news while World News Nick delivers the latest breaking OJ news.

episodes.title: PMS 077 - AyyyyQandA
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down and take questions from Pat McAfee Show fans on twitter. They discuss 80's music, porn, the world cup, drugs, the Band Slip Knot, and much more. Tactical Digs brings us the latest news in sports, World News Nick delivers the latest breaking news, and Vibbs unleashes a new game upon the world.

episodes.title: PMS 076 - Wednesday Special
episodes.description: Pat kicks off the Podcast with a heartfelt speech about the nightmarish past few days. Pat and the boys try to return things to normal the best way they can, through comedy ... Tactical Digs fills us in on the latest sports news and World News Nick gives us the latest happenings around the world. Poor Todd is home sick with the flu, get well soon Todd.

episodes.title: PMS 075 - Friday Celebraish
episodes.description: Get ready for the weekend and join Pat and the boys as celebrate Friday. They discuss going to the doctor, how worthless mosquitos are, Russel Wilson canceling, Playboy magazine, Pat and Digs NFL picks, and Pat's upcoming trip to Blacksburg for the Barstool Tailgate Show.

episodes.title: PMS 074 - Bill Walton
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down after a crazy week of Mariachi bands and exotic animals visiting the Heartland Studio to discuss the Rick Pitino drama, Mr. 305, Justin Timberlake, Flo-Rida, and special guest Bill Walton stops by the studio.

episodes.title: PMS 073 - Dave Portnoy
episodes.description: The founder of Barstool Sports, Dave Portnoy, joins Pat and the boys to discuss how El Presidente built Barstool Sports brick by brick,  horse racing, Patriots vs Colts, gambling, and the early days of Barstool Sports.

episodes.title: PMS 072 - End of the World Party
episodes.description: The end of the world is right around the corner so Pat and the boys have an end of the world party and discuss what they have accomplished with their lives and what they want to accomplish in the last 24 hours. The boys also get a special guest caller from heaven on the podcast.

episodes.title: PMS 071 - The End of the World
episodes.description: The end of the world is supposedly this weekend, but that doesn't stop Pat and the boys from sitting down for a chat about the NFL with Arizona Cardinals offensive lineman, AQ Shipley. The boys talk aliens, trading jerseys, Eric Dickerson partying, and what Todd keeps in his room.

episodes.title: PMS 070 - AJ Hawk
episodes.description: 11 year NFL Vet and Laces Out co-host, AJ Hawk, skypes into the studio to chat with Pat and the boys about Ohio State, celebrating championships, and AJ's love for Aaron Rodgers. World News Nick gives us the latest breaking news, while Tactical Digs informs us about sports and moon sauce.

episodes.title: PMS 069 - Episode 69 (haha)
episodes.description: Pat skypes into the studio from Cincinnati where he is recording NFL virtual reality segments for Intel. The boys learn a what an archipelago is, they discover Vibbs cant read, Tactical Digs gives us the latest sports news, World News Nick delivers breaking news, and Todd McComas takes us "Behind the Badge" with weird laws.

episodes.title: PMS 068 - Jon Gruden
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down for an interview with a man who absolutely rocketed a punt on Monday Night Football, Thomas Morstead. The Monday Night Football action doesn't stop there, Jon Gruden swings by the studio and sits in with the boys. Tactical Digs fills us in on the latest sports news, World News Nick gives us the latest world breaking news and has a meltdown due to too much Will Smith.

episodes.title: PMS 067 - St. Francisco Rams
episodes.description: After the blowout loss to the LA Rams the Indianapolis Colts Head Coach, Chuck Pagano, is called in for an emergency press conference. Pat and the boys discuss Pat's trip to Ohio for Barstool Tailgate, Tactical Digs fills us in on the latest news from week 1 in the NFL, World News Nick brings us the latest breaking news, and Todd goes "Behind The Badge" to break down the police chase Pat was involved in.

episodes.title: PMS 066 - Jerraud Powers
episodes.description: Pat and the boys chat with retired NFL veteran Jerraud Powers about this upcoming football season and the Colts infamous fake punt against the Patriots. The guys discuss the package delivered to the office for Digs, Barstool's new tailgate show, what Pat looks for in a movie, Digs brings us the latest NFL stories, and World News Nick delivers breaking world news.

episodes.title: PMS 065 - Chase Rice
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down for a chat with country superstar Chase Rice. They discuss Chase's college football career, the CMA's, Chase going to the DMZ in Korea, Pat's upcoming schedule, NFL updates from Tactical Digs, and the latest breaking news from World News Nick.

episodes.title: PMS 064 - No Luck
episodes.description: Coming off of Labor Day weekend, Pat and the boys get right into it. They discuss Pat's dog coming home from camp, Vibb's going to the John Mayer concert, taking a bath, a special Chuck Pagano press conference, NFL updates from Tactical Digs, the latest breaking news from World News Nick, and much more on The Pat McAfee Show.

episodes.title: PMS 063 - Green Screen Porn
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down for a podcast to take you into the weekend. They discuss donuts, Voodoo, week 4 of the preseason, green screens, Tactical Digs gives you the latest NFL updates, World News Nick delivers the latest breaking news with a trip past the DMZ for a Jim Kong Update.

episodes.title: PMS 062 - Vontae Davis Stops By
episodes.description: Pat is fresh off the plane after visiting Hendrick Motorsports in Charolette North Carolina and he shares the details with the boys. Chuck Pagano and Vontae Davis stop by for a chat, Digs fills us in on what's going on in the NFL, World News Nick gives us the latest breaking international news, and high school Digs is exposed in Pat's final thought.

episodes.title: PMS 061 - Viral Superstar Kevin Huber
episodes.description: Pat and the boys interview the man from Cincinnati who went viral after pulling off one of the silkiest football moves in Week 3's preseason matchup against Washington, Kevin Huber. Tactical Digs delivers the most recent sports news and World News Nick brings us the latest international news.

episodes.title: PMS 060 - Chuck Pagano Press Conference
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down and discuss all of the things Barstool Heartland has cooking, gun safety, Pat driving a Nascar, the titanic, sports news with Digs, "Behind the Badge with Todd McComas, and we get surprise appearance from Chuck Pagano.

episodes.title: PMS 059 - The Man Who Took an $880,000 Bet
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down for a conversation with a man who took an $880,000 bet on the McGregor vs Mayweather fight, Chris Andrews. They talk about the Bones Jones failed drug test, Tiger Woods dick pics, NBA trades, NFL week 1, and the boys take a trip past the DMZ for a Jim Kong update.

episodes.title: PMS 058 - The Moon Cucks the Sun
episodes.description: The moon cucks the sun and the whole country loses their minds. Your retina's may be burned but your ears are good to listen to Pat talk about his trip to Boston. Digs, Nick, and Vibbs talk about their trip to Pittsburgh while hitting on the biggest stories in sports and the world.

episodes.title: PMS 057 - We Have A Good Time Here
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down for another late night recording at Heartland HQ. No stone goes unturned as every topic that could possibly be covered in a 2 hour window is covered. Pat once again teases the release of his new hit rap single RIP Sea Japan. Look for that to drop soon, and enjoy a good ass conversation among friends.

episodes.title: PMS 055 - Tiger is LIT
episodes.description: Welcome to the era of same day delivery for The Pat McAfee Show. Pat about flipping the rap game upside down, Todd McComas takes us "Behind the Badge", Tactical Digs gives us a sports update, and World News Nick delivers breaking news.

episodes.title: PMS 056 - Rashad Jennings
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down for a chat with NFL running back and Dancing with the Stars Champion Rashad Jennings.

episodes.title: PMS 054 - RIP to the Sea of Japan
episodes.description: Thanks to 100 Retweets in less than a minute by the twitter faithful, here is a Monday edition of The Pat McAfee Show. Pat talks about his first time watching the Colts, we receive breaking news from World News Nick, and get the latest NFL news from Tactical Digs.

episodes.title: PMS 053 - MMA Chat with Matt Mitrione
episodes.description: A bonus episode of The Pat McAfee Show as two legendary badasses, Matt Mitrione and Chris "Lights Out" Lytle, crash the studio for an amazing chat about MMA. Enjoy the bonus episode. Cheers.

episodes.title: PMS 052 - A Lot of Stories
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down for another late night podcast with Bobby the Money guy. The boys cover everything from finances, ordering 500 shots at the bar, and the newly formed "Little 3" Basketball league. The group also takes you on a trip past the DMZ for a Jim Kong update.

episodes.title: PMS 051 - 20 Dollar Chef
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down to podcast after eating an amazing meal prepared by the $20 Chef himself, Shaun Latham. The boys discuss the Dolphins signing Jay Cutler, the blind twin brother prank, Martavis Bryant being reinstated, and take a trip past the DMZ for a Jim Kong update.

episodes.title: PMS 050 - 50th Episode Celebration
episodes.description: It's the 50th episode ... the boys celebrate with Conor Daly.

episodes.title: PMS 049 - Tony Hinchcliffe
episodes.description: Pat and the boys premiere the first episode from the new Heartland Studio. Comedian and Roast Master Tony Hinchcliffe calls in to talk about his upcoming tour and working with celebrities such as Snoop Dogg and Martha Stewart. Pat and the boys go past the DMZ for a Jim Kong update, and Pat gives us his game plan on playing soccer with U.S. legend Tim Howard.

episodes.title: PMS 048 - Diamond Dallas Page
episodes.description: BANG! Diamond Dallas Page joins Pat and the boys and talks DDP Yoga, taking on Brock Lesner in the ring, Jake the Snake, and DDP's acting career. The boys fill pat in on the worst concert of all time, Pat gives his take on the most recent CTE study, Degenerate Digs gives his NFL week 1 gambling picks, and Todd takes us "Behind The Badge" with a real life horror story.

episodes.title: PMS 047 - Travis Pastrana
episodes.description: Extreme/action sports icon Travis Pastrana joins the show and Pat attempts to find out what Travis is truly afraid of. The guys talk about the best show on tv (Game of Thrones) and the worst show on tv (Michael Phelps Races a Shark). Pat goes to the movie Dunkirk and throws a carnival for his ladies birthday. The boys also take a trip past the DMZ for a Jim Kong update.

episodes.title: PMS 046 - Life Advice From A Pro Bookie
episodes.description: One of the best bookies in Las Vegas, Chris Andrews calls into the show to shed some light on the gambling industry. Not only is this podcast filled with great gambling advice, but Pat and the boys  dish out cant miss life advice on texting and driving, sexual intercourse, catching punted balls, police search warrants, and more. The boys also take a trip past the DMZ and get a Jim Kong update.

episodes.title: PMS 045 - Bruce Arians
episodes.description: Arizona Cardinals coach Bruce Arians joins Pat and the guys to discuss his reputation as a player's coach, his respect for Andrew Luck, running up the score, and his relationship with Ben Rothlisberger. Pat and the boys also discuss the Game of Thrones premiere, R. Kelly's legal trouble, Tim Tebow dominating the minors, and we take a trip past the DMZ for a Jim Kong update.

episodes.title: PMS 044 - Fitness Gurus
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down and discuss the new HBO show "The Defiant Ones", the McGregor vs Mayweather press conference, the legend of Wild Bill Hickok, and they chat with two of the most successful serial entrepreneurs in fitness, John Fosco and Cory Gregory.

episodes.title: PMS 043 - Hot Tub AIDS
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down and recap their 4th of July weekend at the Greenbrier with John Daly, who had sex in a hot tub this weekend, Nick and Digs becoming dads to Sugar Gliders, Todd McComas gives us a glance behind the badge, and we take a trip past the DMZ to get an update on old buddy Jim Kong.

episodes.title: PMS 042 - John Daly at the Greenbrier
episodes.description: Pat and the boys recorded this episode on the tour bus of a living legend, John Daly. Pat and John talk about being partners in the PGA tour Pro-AM at the Greenbrier, chocolate milk, living on a boat, surgeries, the White House, and going to the casino. Todd also takes us on a quick trip "Behind the Badge".

episodes.title: PMS 041 - America's Birthday
episodes.description: Pat and the boys are back from vacation and ready to celebrate America's Birthday. The guys talk about their vacations and how good it is to be back in the good old US of A, Trump's unprecedented presidential GIF, getting your twitter hacked like Jim Irsay, and Todd takes us "Behind the Badge".

episodes.title: PMS 040 - Behind The Badge
episodes.description: This episode is 1 hour and 48 minutes of Behind The Badge.  It's hosted by Todd McComas and co-hosted by comedian Jeff Vibbert, U.S. Army veteran Ryan Cauley and firefighter / UFC legend Chris "Lights Out" Lytle.  The last 45 minutes of this episode features special guests Marty Dulworth and Joe Garrett.  Marty and Joe are brothers that are both police officers for the city of Anderson, IN.  Marty and Joe tell the crew the most intense story of courage, comradery, fortitude and sense of duty ever told.  A story about how "just another shift" left Marty and his canine "Kilo" in a terrifying battle for their lives and left Joe in a desperate race to find his younger brother and get him out of harm's way.  If this story doesn't move you, you don't have a pulse.

episodes.title: PMS 039 - Billy Buck Roscoe
episodes.description: Pat and the boys are joined by Billy Buck Roscoe, a man who loves two things; his country and drinking beer. Billy Buck's drinking videos have made him an internet sensation, but his tales of sex and patriotism on this podcast will make him a legend.

episodes.title: PMS 038 - Adam Vinatieri
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down with the greatest kicker in the history of the National Football League, Adam Vinatieri, and discuss the ins and outs of a living legend's career.

episodes.title: PMS 037 - Pat Phones It In
episodes.description: Pat phones into the studio from high society Connecticut to tell the boys all about his first morning on NBC Sports Pro Football Talk with Mike Florio. The boys recap their $1,000 bar tab, Paul George leaving Indy, foreign drama, and go "Behind the Badge" with Todd.

episodes.title: PMS 036 - The Greatest Original Movie Ever Written
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down for a ridiculous interview with Stanley Cup Champion, Ian Cole, from the middle of the Penguin's championship parade. Pat plants a seed for an amazing original movie and the boys water it until it blooms into the greatest original movie ... ever created.

episodes.title: PMS 035 - Stanley Cup Celebration
episodes.description: The Pittsburgh Penguins are "back to back" Stanley Cup Champs! Pat and the boys celebrate by having the voice of Pittsburgh, Mark Madden, on the podcast with a special guest appearance by Pen's superfan, AQ Shipley. Digs tells us about his interesting Uber experience, Todd takes us "Behind the Badge", and Nick takes us on a trip past the DMZ for a JimKong update.

episodes.title: PMS 034 - Rip Rodgers
episodes.description: Rip Rodgers is a wrestling legend and a man without a filter. Rip tells Pat and the boys everything about wrestling and life; in the most raw interview to ever hit the Pat McAfee Show. Todd McComas takes us "Behind the Badge". The boys get a visit from the next president of The United States, and the gang goes on a trip past the DMZ for a Jim Kong update.

episodes.title: PMS 033 - Michael Waltrip
episodes.description: Two time Daytona 500 winner and Fox Nascar analyst Michael Waltrip calls in and answers the question everyone wants to know about racing. The gang discusses going to the zoo, Pat's wrestling training, the NHL and NBA playoffs, players fighting coaches, and the Kathy Griffin drama. The boys also take a trip past the DMZ and get a Jim Kong Update.

episodes.title: PMS 032 - Paul Bissonnette
episodes.description: "BizNasty" Paul Bissonnette joins the show to talk Stanley Cup Finals and his NHL career. Pat accepts a challenge from his mother to donate $ to charity every time he swears on the show. Todd takes everyone Behind The Badge on his experiences with bribes. Other topics include Tiger Woods DUI, Jim Kong's new iPad, and a font to indicate sarcasm.

episodes.title: PMS 031 - The Greatest Spectacle in Racing
episodes.description: Pat and crew present their final show from the Indy 500 infield in dire conditions of what is left of #CampHeartland. The recap of the previous week provides insight into meeting the drivers, the events of the race, and the ridiculous party atmosphere at the track. A Jim Kong update and the Tiger Woods arrest are discussed as well.

episodes.title: PMS 030 - Conor Daly
episodes.description: Pat and the boys sit down with a man who knows more about rockets than Jim Kong, Indy car driver; Conor Daly. Pat asks the hard hitting questions we all want to know about Indy car drivers. Strap yourself in and feel the G's.

episodes.title: PMS 029 - Hot, Nasty Speed
episodes.description: Pat and the boys come to you LIVE from their RV in the Indy 500 infield with everything you need to know about the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. The crew talks about bowing to the queen, dueling, driverless cars, gods, and how god awful Will Smith is at acting. We also go "Behind the Badge" and take a trip past the DMZ for a Jim Kong update.

episodes.title: PMS 028 - Buck Coltrain, Country Superstar
episodes.description: This episode features our first live music performance from country superstar Buck Coltrain. Pat and the boys talk about the upcoming week at the Indy 500. Also, the crew teaches us about history, science, dolphins, and the male romper. Todd takes you "Behind the Badge" and we take a trip past the DMZ to North Korea for a Jim Kong update.

episodes.title: PMS 027 - Slept at John Daly's House
episodes.description: Pat, Nick, and Digs went balls deep in the meat of Arkansas to spend the weekend with golf legend and American icon John Daly. Meanwhile Todd stayed home in Indianapolis and headlined a comedy show. Jim Kong makes a visit and we take a trip "Behind the Badge".

episodes.title: PMS 026 - Detroit Recap
episodes.description: Pat heads off to the magical land of Detroit where he learns about amperands and Chinese culture. Nick and Digs finalize names for their Sugar Gliders, while Todd takes us "Behind The Badge". The crew also takes us on a trip past the DMZ for a Jim Kong update.

episodes.title: PMS 025 - The Haunted Basement
episodes.description: Pat McAfee Show's first recording in the new temporary studio (Pat's basement). Today's guest was former NFL linebacker, Kamerion Wimbley, who will be featured on next season of MTV's Challenge: Champs vs Pros. Digs and Nick discuss getting new pets. Pat and the boys reminisce on television shows they watched as kids, recap the Kentucky Derby, and talk BBB Shoes. Todd takes us Behind The Badge.

episodes.title: PMS 024 - Jerome Bettis
episodes.description: Pat's birthday surprise kid napping, hearing the future, Japan talk, upcoming fights, game shows, Pat's cruise ship offer, Digs' brain, Behind the Badge, jersey chasers, Colts team stories, Pat's NBA rebound average, ADD sports, Jerome Bettis calls, t-shirt previews, future of medicine, Pat's TV reviews,  #JimKong update.

episodes.title: PMS 023 - Mike Florio
episodes.description: First we celebrate Pat's 30th Birthday!  Then on to Todd's story of gulping down a glass of box wine, Pat will die young, Purdue show announced for Sept. 23, 2017.  The boys are impressed with Serena Williams winning while pregnant.  Then cat talk, Lavar Ball, shoe deals, way-too-much Canada talk, Digs' brain, Noah is Pat's OG.  Mike Florio from ProFootballTalk joins us.  Mountain climbing deaths, Fyre Festival disaster, #JimKong update.

episodes.title: PMS 022 - Draft Weekend Memories
episodes.description: Digs finds vindication within the Hernandez suicide, Achilles talk, Pat learns about Batman, Pat relives his draft weekend back in 2009, Pat divulges his amazing TD celebration that never happened.  Jeter buys the Marlins, ESPN layoffs, Skip Bayless and Fox Sports.  #JimKong update, wild boars, Pat has yet another ISIS rant and Ice Beer.

episodes.title: PMS 021 - Super Bowl Champ Chris Long
episodes.description: First a Pittsburgh trip recap, getting pulled over stories and Pat has something to say about the reporter/Westbrook incident.  Pat then gets punched in the face.  Super Bowl Champ Chris Long calls.  #JimKong update, Bitcoins and Banks, and Pat rants on terrible food/service.

episodes.title: PMS 020 - Heartland
episodes.description: The boys speculate A LOT about the death of Aaron Hernandez, get upset over the Adidas gaffe (but are willing to fix it).  Pat gets very upset over a bald eagle shooting and ups the $$ for a tip leading to the guilty idiot.  Pat also does a voiceover for a porno.  "What if Digs were a dictator?" and of course, A Kim Jung Un Update.

episodes.title: PMS 019 - Ryan Whitney
episodes.description: This episode features a phone interview with Ryan Whitney.  Ryan is a former NHL Defenseman, an NHL Analyst and the host of the hit podcast "Spittin' Chiclets" presented by Barstool Sports.  Pat and the boys also caught up with their "6th Man" Kim Jong Un and talked a little sports and world news.  This episode also features a Behind the Badge segment.

episodes.title: PMS 018 - Steve Weatherford
episodes.description: Fellow former NFL punter, Steve Weatherford joins Pat and the boys in NYC.  They discuss who is more America, they also recall Pat intimidating Steve during pre-game warmups, driving around the Indy 500 track with a Mario.  Michael Cohen calls to promote the show on the show. Tebow talk and out-hustling the hustlers.

episodes.title: PMS 017 - Gary Vaynerchuk
episodes.description: Pat and the boys are still at Barstool HQ in NYC... Pat still hates NYC, but it's growing on him.  Entrepreneur and motivator, Gary Vaynerchuk joins us and brings the heat.  We talk motivation, execution, hustling, football and more.  Plus he challenges you to support #1PagePat and if you have ANY question for the guys, use #PatandGary

episodes.title: PMS 016 - Chaps
episodes.description: Pat and the boys are in Barstool HQ in NYC.  Pat hates NYC, but he doesn't hate speaking with one of his favorite co-workers, Chaps from the Zero Blog Thirty podcast.  Stay for the entire episode because Chaps ends with an epic story of the day he was injured in battle and pays tribute to his brothers in arms.

episodes.title: PMS 015 - For The People
episodes.description: Pat and the boys talk a lot about Kim Jong-Un, the NHL's efforts to deny players the opportunity to represent their country in the Olympic Games, and Pat's plan to get in peak physical condition now that he's out of the NFL.

episodes.title: PMS 014 - Stephen Jackson
episodes.description: This episode features an amazing interview with retired NBA player Stephen Jackson.  Jackson had an illustrious 14 year career and is regarded by many as one the best players to never be voted to an All-Star roster.  He was a major contributor to the San Antonio Spurs' NBA Championship in 2003 and is now focusing on his career as an analyst with ESPN and a future in coaching.  As usual, Pat and the boys also talked a little sports, world news and they caught up with their boy Kim Jong-Un.

episodes.title: PMS 013 - New York Hangover
episodes.description: Pat and the boys recap their quick trip to New York to party with "El Pres" and the gang.  They absolutely killed themselves so they were still recovering from the damage of Saturday night.  They talked a little sports, they talked a little world news and they caught up with their boy Kim Jong-Un.

episodes.title: PMS 012 - Happy Birthday Tactical Digs
episodes.description: Our boy Tactical Digs turned 29! Pat and the boys talked sports, covered some world news, checked in on Kim Jong-Un, Pat conveyed a heartfelt message to the fans of his show and Barstool Indy, and then wrapped things up with Behind The Badge.

episodes.title: PMS 011 - John Daly
episodes.description: PGA legend John Daly was our guest.  John hits it hard man and Pat is his biggest fan.  They had a legendary conversation that will undoubtedly lead to a beautiful friendship.  The boys covered everything from Lavar Ball to Kim Jong-Un and Pat rounds out the Vegas aftermath.

episodes.title: PMS 010 - Vegas Recap
episodes.description: WARNING: This episode was a hilarious train wreck and we didn't edit out a single moment.  Pat and the boys give Todd and the listeners a full recap of their Vegas trip this past weekend.  You should know that Pat, Digs and Nick landed back in Indy 4 hours before this episode was recorded and their bodies and minds were still tore down from their insane weekend in Sin City.  But the show must go on!  To our listeners...you're welcome.  To our sponsors...we're sorry.

episodes.title: PMS 009 - A.Q. Shipley
episodes.description: This episode features an interview with Arizona Cardinals center and food enthusiast,  A.Q. Shipley.  Pat discusses what retirement has been like for him thus far and reveals his plans for the future.  Pat and the boys attempt to reach out directly to Kim Jong Un and they talk a little sports and world news.  This episode also features a jazzed-up segment of Behind the Badge.

episodes.title: PMS 008 - Don't be the baboon
episodes.description: Wednesdays are for the crew.  No guests, no ad reads, just Pat and the boys chilling out and having a conversation.  They discussed Pat's past trips in Vegas, Dave Chapelle's return to comedy standup comedy and what's happening in the world.

episodes.title: PMS 007 - Dan Dakich, Darius Butler
episodes.description: This episode features a March Madness rundown with ESPN analyst and radio host Dan Dakich and an interview with Colts cornerback turned safety, Darius Butler.  Pat and the boys also discuss Pat's win in Barstool Sports' Bud Light Busters Challenge and his subsequent upcoming trip to Vegas.

episodes.title: PMS 006 - Edgerrin James
episodes.description: This episode features an interview with former NFL running back and future Hall of Famer Edgerrin James.  Pat and the boys discuss what's happening in sports and world news and they unveil the long-awaited Chicken Story during this week's segment of Behind the Badge.

episodes.title: PMS 005 - Just Us
episodes.description: There was no guest this episode.  Just Pat and the boys talking about what's going on in the world.

episodes.title: PMS 004 - Dan Dakich / Dave Portnoy
episodes.description: This episode features interviews with ESPN analyst and radio host Dan Dakich and founder of Barstool Sports, Dave "El Pres" Portnoy.  Dan Dakich breaks down his NCAA Men's Basketball bracket and Dave Portnoy breaks down his opinion of Soul Cycle instructors.  The boys cover what's happening in the world with sports and other news, Uncle Todd answers the weekly cop question in Behind the Badge, and Pat shares his opinion on how America is getting soft.

episodes.title: PMS 003 - Mike Barwis, Arian Foster
episodes.description: This episode features interviews with Strength and conditioning coach Mike Barwis and retired NFL running back and potential wolf slayer Arian Foster.  The boys also discussed what's going on in the world and they introduced their new "Ask a Cop" segment.

episodes.title: PMS 002 - Pierre Garcon, Drew Rosenhaus, Brandon McManus and Ryan Whitney
episodes.description: This episode features interviews with Washington Redskins lead receiver Pierre Garcon, Sports Agent Drew Rosenhaus, Denver Broncos kicker Brandon McManus and Former NHL Defenseman / podcaster and NHL Analyst Ryan Witney.

episodes.title: PMS 001 - Glenn Robinson III, Matt Hasselbeck and Dan Dakich
episodes.description: The first official episode of The Pat McAfee show features interviews with The 2017 NBA Slam Dunk Champ, Glenn Robinson III in the first hour, Former NFL quarterback / ESPN analyst Matt Hasselbeck in the second hour and ESPN sportscaster / radio host Dan Dakich wraps things up at the end.

episodes.title: Pat McAfee Show Announcement
episodes.description: The Pat McAfee Show presented by Barstool Sports
